about_the_game:
This Game is Open World Action RPG including Shooting and Racing.
WarOfGods 2, Modern World is the story of Greek goddesses coming from the multiverse world to the modern world, encountering various modern civilizations, having new experiences, and ruling the city with their pets. Each goddess has the abilities of a god, but as they experience modern civilization, they use a variety of modern equipment to rule and protect the city.

An open world adventure where you decorate and protect the city with Greek goddesses and pets. Experience various interesting events that occur when modernity and mythology meet. Enjoy exciting racing, control robots, explore the world with various creatures such as dragons, horses, and pets, and rule the city. You'll get the game for early adopters around October 2024.

.

Each goddess has the abilities of a god, but as they experience modern civilization, they use a variety of modern equipment to rule and protect the city.

An open world adventure where you decorate and protect the city with Greek goddesses and pets. Experience various interesting events that occur when modernity and mythology meet. Enjoy exciting racing, control robots, explore the world with various creatures such as dragons, horses, and pets, and rule the city. You'll get the game for early adopters around October 2024.

name: WarOfGods 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: window 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-2600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: window 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 4060 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: A great adventure to rule the city with goddesses and pets. The city is being invaded by strange creatures. Protect and rule your city using a variety of creations including cars, bikes, horses, dragons, robots, and more.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Vietnamese, Indonesian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
